alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 3:47AM EST until February 25 at 3:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Combined snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Southern Middlesex, Southern Fairfield, Southern New London and Southern New Haven Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
